scripts.deploy-gnosis: mustache config/xdai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn gen && graph deploy --studio kleros-display-gnosis
scripts.deploy-mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn gen && graph deploy --studio kleros-display-mainnet
scripts.deploy-sepolia: mustache config/sepolia.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn gen && graph deploy --studio kleros-display-sepolia
